yt.tojava.taskmanager

类 TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • yt.tojava.taskmanager.TaskList

  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskList class that is responsible for keeping the in-memory task list. Most likely this class will use an ArrayList inside it.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      java.util.List<Task> tasks 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TaskList()
      declare the task list
      TaskList(java.util.List<Task> tasks) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addTask(Task t) 
      void clearTask()
      removes all of the elements from this list.The list will be empty after this call returns.
      void markAsDone(java.lang.String line) 
      void markAsEdit(java.lang.String fullCommand) 
      void markAsNotDone(java.lang.String line) 
      void printTasks()
      print the tasks from the list one by one
      void removeTask(java.lang.String line) 
      void saveTasks()
      save the task to the hard disk

    • 方法详细资料

      • markAsDone

        public void markAsDone(java.lang.String line)
        参数:
        line - read full command change the task status to done (true)

      • markAsNotDone

        public void markAsNotDone(java.lang.String line)
        参数:
        line - read full command change the task status to false

      • printTasks

        public void printTasks()
        print the tasks from the list one by one

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask(java.lang.String line)
        参数:
        line - get input from commend line parser the user input and remove the task from task list accordingly

      • addTask

        public void addTask(Task t)
        参数:
        t - get the individual task and add it to the task list

      • clearTask

        public void clearTask()
        removes all of the elements from this list.The list will be empty after this call returns.

      • markAsEdit

        public void markAsEdit(java.lang.String fullCommand)
        参数:
        fullCommand - read full command edit task's details accordingly

      • saveTasks

        public void saveTasks()
        save the task to the hard disk
